scripts.version:create:stable: node version-management/version-manager.js create v1.0.0-stable '基础核心功能版'
scripts.version:create:beta: node version-management/version-manager.js create v1.1.0-beta '测试版本'
scripts.version:create:dev: node version-management/version-manager.js create v1.1.1-dev '开发版本'
scripts.backup:create: node version-management/version-manager.js create backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) '自动备份'
scripts.version:check: node version-management/version-manager.js current && npm run version:list
